meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Maura McKenna Carolyn Collins Arthur Chu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6764.

td.p: Maura McKenna, a legal technology consultant from Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
Carolyn Collins, an education program manager from Washington, D.C. (whose 1-day cash winnings total $26,800)
Arthur Chu, a compliance analyst and voiceover artist from Broadview Heights, Ohio (whose 2-day cash winnings total $64,000)

tr.td: THE TOP 40 A TO Z
HEALTH & NUTRITION
MISSING LINKS
NEWSPAPERS
BLACK & WHITE & READ
ALL OVER

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
